sentences.sContent: Some is controlled in loving covet below, or when mania patient sexual desire increases, can produce clodhopping words and deeds to opposite sex staff member.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some is controlled in loving covet below, or when mania patient sexual desire increases, can produce clodhopping words and deeds to opposite sex staff member.
sentences.sCn: 有的在钟情妄想支配下，或躁狂病人性欲增强时，可对异性工作人员产生不礼貌的言行。
